Articles.Content:
i just returned from my mission to ike and i have i question

even though i warped time so the kerbol (sun) was right above us, it was so damn dark at the surface.

when i take a look at my photos from mun and minimus and even duna, ike looks like it has black clouds above the surface

Edited August 19, 2014 by Cannon
Some players experienced this as a bug a while back. I hadn't heard of it happening recently.
I had that happen the first time I landed on Ike, back in ...I think it was 0.19. It was a nightmare, it was like backing into a black abyss.
A reload of the game would be the only thing I could suggest.
